channel.title: Preps on CYF+
channel.description: Recent content in Preps on CYF+

item.title: Preparation
item.description: Prerequisite learning Before you start this course, there’s a few things we assume you’ve done: You’re familiar with the essentials of writing code in JavaScript You have experience with JavaScript in the browser and in Node You’ve completed the Tour of Go This is important because we don’t cover the basic language features of Go: you need to be familiar with writing Go functions and methods, plus the basics of types in Go.
